_header: Saint Etheldreda of Ely good woman was and hende
Subjects: Etheldreda, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Etheldreda in the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Eþeldrede of ely gode mayde was & hendehere fadir was king
                    of ingelond of al þe est ende…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…of here me makeþ in holy chirche gret feste a ȝer I
                    wisnow god for þe loue of here bring vs to heuin blis

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Aeldrede of heli god Mayde was and hendeHire fader was kyng
                    of Engelonde of al þe Est ende…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of hire me makeþ in Heli gret feste a ȝer i wisNou
                    God for þe loue of hire bring vs to heuene blis. A.M.E.N.

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint aeldri of eli god mon was & hendeHire fader was king of engelond of al þat est ende…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Of hire me makeþ in eli gret feste aȝer iwisNow god for þe loue of hire bring us to heuene blis
